changeSet.author: Ahmed.Baz
changeSet.sql: create table course_rates ( id bigserial not null, course_id int8 not null, rate int4 not null, created_at timestamp, created_by varchar (255), last_modified_at timestamp, last_modified_by varchar (255), CONSTRAINT course_rates_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), constraint course_rates_fk foreign key (course_id) references courses (id) );
create sequence course_rates_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 9999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 cache 20;

create table course_reviews ( id bigserial not null, course_id int8 not null, review varchar(255) not null, created_at timestamp, created_by varchar(255), last_modified_at timestamp, last_modified_by varchar(255), CONSTRAINT course_reviews_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), constraint course_reviews_fk foreign key (course_id) references courses (id) );
create sequence course_reviews_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 9999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 cache 20;
